record.field: Sent to customers with FIOS active Units

div.p:
Dear Valued Customer,
We have implemented a new process to verify units for the billing month prior to issuing invoice to make sure that the tax invoices remain unedited. Therefore, an active list of vehicles will be shared by the Billing Team with you on the 1st working day of each month. It is required to approve the active list for the billing month by the 7th working day with any changes that are requested. Tax invoices will be issued by the 10th working day and it will not be possible to edit invoices once issued.
For any clarification, please get in touch with the relevant billing contact at KLOUDIP or write to billing@kloudip.com
Billing Team
